data.SOURCE:
@AbapCatalog.viewEnhancementCategory: [#NONE]
@AccessControl.authorizationCheck: #NOT_REQUIRED
@EndUserText.label: 'Masraf Raporu'
@Metadata.ignorePropagatedAnnotations: true
@ObjectModel.usageType:{
    serviceQuality: #X,
    sizeCategory: #S,
    dataClass: #MIXED
}
define view entity YI_NFT_DDL_IMP_COST_REPORT
  as select from    ynft_t_r002                                                      as r002
    inner join      ynft_t_r001                                                      as r001       on  r001.companycode        = r002.companycode
                                                                                                   and r001.accountingdocument = r002.accountingdocument
                                                                                                   and r001.fiscalyear         = r002.fiscalyear
    inner join      I_JournalEntry                                                   as je         on  je.CompanyCode        = r001.companycode
                                                                                                   and je.FiscalYear         = r001.fiscalyear
                                                                                                   and je.AccountingDocument = r001.accountingdocument
    inner join      I_JournalEntryItem                                               as jeitem     on  jeitem.CompanyCode          = r001.companycode
                                                                                                   and jeitem.FiscalYear           = r001.fiscalyear
                                                                                                   and jeitem.AccountingDocument   = r001.accountingdocument
                                                                                                   and jeitem.FinancialAccountType = 'K'
                                                                                                   and jeitem.Ledger               = '0L'
    inner join      I_OperationalAcctgDocItem                                        as bseg       on  bseg.CompanyCode            = r001.companycode
                                                                                                   and bseg.FiscalYear             = r001.fiscalyear
                                                                                                   and bseg.AccountingDocument     = r001.accountingdocument
                                                                                                   and bseg.AccountingDocumentItem = r002.accountingdocumentitem
    inner join      ynft_t_dlv_cus                                                   as dlv_cus    on dlv_cus.deliverydocument = r002.deliverydocument
    inner join      ynft_t_dlvit_cus                                                 as dlvit_cus  on  dlvit_cus.deliverydocument     = r002.deliverydocument
                                                                                                   and dlvit_cus.deliverydocumentitem = r002.deliverydocumentitem
    left outer join I_DeliveryDocumentItem                                           as lips       on  lips.DeliveryDocument     = r002.deliverydocument
                                                                                                   and lips.DeliveryDocumentItem = r002.deliverydocumentitem
    left outer join I_PurchaseOrderItemAPI01                                         as POItem     on  POItem.PurchaseOrder     = dlvit_cus.purchaseorder
                                                                                                   and POItem.PurchaseOrderItem = dlvit_cus.purchaseorderitem
    left outer join DDCDS_CUSTOMER_DOMAIN_VALUE_T( p_domain_name: 'YNFT_D_VORGANG' ) as vorgang_tx on  vorgang_tx.language  = $session.system_language
                                                                                                   and vorgang_tx.value_low = r001.vorgang
    left outer join DDCDS_CUSTOMER_DOMAIN_VALUE_T( p_domain_name: 'YNFT_D_CSRCE' )   as CSRCE_tx   on  CSRCE_tx.language  = $session.system_language
                                                                                                   and CSRCE_tx.value_low = r001.costsource
    left outer join ynft_t_x004                                                      as ctype_tx   on  ctype_tx.ctype = r002.costtype
                                                                                                   and ctype_tx.spras = $session.system_language
    left outer join DDCDS_CUSTOMER_DOMAIN_VALUE_T( p_domain_name: 'YNFT_D_DDTYP' )   as ddtyp_tx   on  ddtyp_tx.language  = $session.system_language
                                                                                                   and ddtyp_tx.value_low = dlv_cus.documenttype
  left outer join I_ProductText            as ProductText on  ProductText.Product  = POItem.Material
                                                          and ProductText.Language = $session.system_language   
  left outer join I_UnitOfMeasure on I_UnitOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasure = lips.DeliveryQuantityUnit                                                                                                                                                          

{
  key r001.companycode,
  key r001.accountingdocument,
  key r001.fiscalyear,
  key r002.accountingdocumentitem,
      r001.costsource,
      CSRCE_tx.text                                                                                       as costsourcetext,
      r001.vorgang,
      vorgang_tx.text                                                                                     as vorgangtext,
      je.PostingDate,
      je.DocumentDate,
      je.DocumentReferenceID,
      je.TransactionCurrency,
      jeitem.DocumentItemText,
      jeitem.Supplier,
      jeitem._SupplierText.SupplierName                                                                   as SupplierName,
      je.AccountingDocumentType,
      je.ExchangeRateDate,
      je.AbsoluteExchangeRate,
      je.AccountingDocumentHeaderText,
      jeitem.AssignmentReference,
      bseg.DueCalculationBaseDate,
      bseg.CashDiscount1Days,
      bseg.CashDiscount2Days,
      bseg.NetPaymentDays,
      bseg.PaymentTerms,
      jeitem.SpecialGLCode,
      bseg.PaymentMethod,
      je.ReverseDocument,
      je.ReverseDocumentFiscalYear,
      jeitem.ClearingDate,
      r001.letterofcreditnumber,
      r001.agencytotransfer,
      r001.companycode_tran,
      r001.accountingdocument_tran,
      r001.fiscalyear_tran,
      r002.costtype,
      ctype_tx.bezei                                                                                      as costtypetext,
      //      lips.ReferenceSDDocument,
      //      lips.ReferenceSDDocumentItem,
      POItem.PurchaseOrder                                                                                as ReferenceSDDocument,
      POItem.PurchaseOrderItem                                                                            as ReferenceSDDocumentItem,
      r002.deliverydocument,
      r002.deliverydocumentitem,
      dlv_cus.documenttype,
      ddtyp_tx.text                                                                                       as documenttypetext,
      POItem.Plant,
      POItem.Material,
      ProductText.ProductName as MaterialName,
      @Semantics.quantity.unitOfMeasure: 'DeliveryQuantityUnit'
      case dlv_cus.documenttype when '1' then dlvit_cus.shipquantity else lips.ActualDeliveryQuantity end as ActualDeliveryQuantity,
//      case dlv_cus.documenttype when '1' then dlvit_cus.quantityunit else lips.DeliveryQuantityUnit end   as DeliveryQuantityUnit,
      case dlv_cus.documenttype when '1' then dlvit_cus.quantityunit else cast( I_UnitOfMeasure.UnitOfMeasure_E as msehi ) end   as DeliveryQuantityUnit,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      r002.documentcurrenyamount,
      r002.documentcurrency,
      r002.taxcode,
      @Semantics.amount.currencyCode: 'DocumentCurrency'
      r002.taxamount,
      @ObjectModel.virtualElementCalculatedBy: 'ABAP:YCL_YNFT_IMP_GET_CLEAR_BALANCE'
      cast( '' as abap.char(10))                                                                          as accountingdocument_inv,
      @ObjectModel.virtualElementCalculatedBy: 'ABAP:YCL_YNFT_IMP_GET_CLEAR_BALANCE'
      cast( '' as abap.numc(4))                                                                           as fiscalyear_inv



}
